name: TitusTalk
_source: s;Titus;Hey, I got in contact with some of the other knights.
s;Titus;Sorry to say I couldn't get much, other than their neutrality.|They're not one to take sides in politics.
s;Simon;I understand.{w} Thank you for trying.|At the very least, having one fewer enemy will help.
s;Titus;Yeah, we got too many of those already.|Good luck in those talks, kid.|I wouldn't want to be you.
